title: Charitable Giving and Financial Planning
description: This chapter explores how charitable giving can be integrated into financial planning, covering various forms of contributions (monetary, volunteering, in-kind, planned giving) and how these align with personal values and financial goals. Students learn to develop giving strategies that create positive impact while maintaining financial well-being.
learning_objectives: Understand various forms of charitable giving (monetary, in-kind, volunteering, planned giving)
Learn how charitable giving can be incorporated into financial planning
Explore the personal and societal benefits of charitable giving
Reflect on non-monetary ways to contribute to their community

skill_builder.title: Personal Charitable Giving Plan
skill_builder.description: In this activity, students create a personalized charitable giving plan that aligns with their values, interests, and resources. They select causes they care about, determine appropriate contribution types, set realistic goals, and explain their giving strategy.

author: PFL Academy Curriculum Team
